documents.document: This morning @MyFDOT is beginning to install speed tables on a section of West University where two pedestrians have died in recent months. @DrB_OnMedia has the details: https://t.co/DnbwYp507h via @NewsGainesville

Heads up: The Alachua County health department has announced a series of walk-up #COVID19 vaccine clinics in Gainesville. The first one starts at 11 am today: https://t.co/d7wyoF9CNj via @NewsGainesville
Gov. Ron DeSantis used executive action to ban vaccine passports and end all local COVID-19 emergency orders on Monday. #LocalNews #Florida #COVID19 https://t.co/RtGFQWSU3x

The Alachua County Sheriff's Office has arrested two suspects for the theft of two vehicles and multiple break-ins of cars at the Arbor Greens development in Jonesville. #Alachua #LocalNews #Monday https://t.co/GU2gTcLCR3
A driver and passenger died in an Saturday morning crash on West University, according to the Gainesville Police Department (GPD). #Gainesville #LocalNews #Monday https://t.co/H62mcWXJXE
RT @ridaught: Sports beat: Williston softball crushes top seed Hawthorne to win district title https://t.co/vUusCT3Hk4

The @RowdyEHSRams boys tennis team made it to state for the first time in six years. They lost in the semis to Satellite, but head coach Don Reeder says the best may be yet to come: https://t.co/zTbOiHbQpa via @NewsGainesville
.@suzettemcook has the details on why the Westgate @Publix is closing tomorrowincluding renderings of the future store that will sit in its place: https://t.co/mODSmYPbZL via @NewsGainesville

The Children's Trust of Alachua County board has approved $1.1 million in funding for more than 2,000 additional free or reduced-price seats for Alachua County young people to participate in summer camps. #Alachua #LocalNews #Summer #Friday https://t.co/gBmd23fxkv

The @FloridaGators family and especially @GatorsFB and @GatorBoosters are remembering the late Stumpy Harris as a great supporter of Gator athletics: https://t.co/mf2wT5M6gQ via @NewsGainesville (Don't miss the classic cars pics!)

We're excited to announce our new corrections tool is now live! On each story at @NewsGainesville, you have an opportunity to click "Suggest a Correction" to help us improve accuracy. It's part of our commitment to be the most trusted source of news in North Central Florida! https://t.co/FSQe6rOdyC
The Alachua County Sheriff's Office (ASO) is asking for the public's help locating a missing man. #missing #Alachua #LocalNews https://t.co/df70Ja9Zkq

Mayor Jordan Marlowe and the rest of the Newberry Commission voted to request that Alachua County establish a rural highway improvement program and move that same road to the top of the list. #LocalNews #Wednesday #Alachua https://t.co/3ROSIrZ4KG

No more busy signals, missed call-backs and competing registration systems! Now, for residents of Alachua County, those issues are a thing of the past. #Covid19 #Vaccine #Gainesville https://t.co/J5gSiLIlrP

The City of Newberry will fund a $50,000 report on behalf of multiple cities in an effort to move forward the exploration of a regional wastewater facility in western Alachua County. #LocalNews #Monday #Newberry https://t.co/b8CUyJfdfQ
Levy County Emergency Management has announced three vaccine pop-up sites are scheduled this week in Bronson, Chiefland and Cedar Key. #Monday #Alachua #COVID19Vaccine https://t.co/ek84UqiHOH
.@AlachuaSchools has relaxed its #COVID19 protocols and announced masks will be optional in the 2021-22 school year. Details at @NewsGainesville: https://t.co/REfC75fQ1a

A student at Newberry's Oak View Middle School reportedly found a gun in student's backpack on Tuesday and turned it over to a teacher. Click the article below to see more details. #LocalNewsMatters #Wednesday #Alachua https://t.co/RRWJ47T3MK

A jury found former police officer Derek Chauvin guilty of murder and manslaughter charges in the killing of George Floyd. Gainesville Mayor @laurenbpoe expressed "love and solidarity" with those affected. https://t.co/Ytk9EMvBbG @NewsGainesville #GeorgeFloydverdict
